credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Coriolanus Agrees to Lift the Siege of Rome
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
description: Coriolanus shown in his camp extending his arm toward his mother, Veturia. She speaks to him while wife, Volumnia, and other women and children urge him by praying.
name: Drawing
